    <script type="text/javascript">
        // <![CDATA[
        $(document).ready(function () {
            $.anystretch("/template/image/login/login_bg.jpg", { speed: 150 });


            $('#divLoginBanners').iosSlider({
                desktopClickDrag: true,
                snapToChildren: true,
                infiniteSlider: true,
                autoSlide: true,
                autoSlideTimer: 4000,
                scrollbar: false,
                keyboardControls: true,
                navSlideSelector: '#divBannerButtons li',
                onSlideChange: slideLoginBannerChange,
                onSlideStart: slideLoginBannerStart
            });

            function slideLoginBannerStart(args) {
                $('#divBannerButtons li:eq(0) a').addClass('active');
            }

            function slideLoginBannerChange(args) {
                $('#divBannerButtons li a').removeClass('active');
                $('#divBannerButtons li:eq(' + (args.currentSlideNumber - 1) + ') a').addClass('active');
            }

            // Banner balonları
            $("#divBannerButtons li a").mouseenter(function () {
                $("#divBannerButtons li a div").slideUp();
                $("div", this).slideDown('slow');
            }).mouseleave(function () {
                $("#divBannerButtons li a div").slideUp();
            });


            $("#login_help_open, #aTryAgain").click(function () {
                $("#divResetInfo").hide();
                $("#divResetForm").show();
                $("#login_help_box").show();
            });

            $("#login_help_close").click(function () {
                $("#login_help_box").fadeOut();
                $("#divResetInfo").hide();
            });

            $("#aHelp").click(function () {
                $("#divLegalNotice").dialog({
                    buttons: { "Tamam": function () { $(this).dialog("close"); } },

                    resizable: false,
                    title: "Bilgilendirme",
                    modal: true,
                    width: 'auto'
                });
            });

            if (navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase().indexOf("chrome") >= 0) {
                $(window).load(function () {
                    $('input:-webkit-autofill').each(function () {
                        var text = $(this).val();
                        var name = $(this).attr('name');
                        $(this).after(this.outerHTML).remove();
                        $('input[name=' + name + ']').val(text);
                    });
                });
            }

            $("#aResetIt").click(function () {
                var oCRMNumber = $("#txtInternetCRMNumber");
                var oUserName = $("#txtUserName");
                var oEmail = $("#txtEmail");

                var bValid = true;

                oCRMNumber.removeClass('ui-state-error');
                oUserName.removeClass('ui-state-error');

                bValid = bValid && checkLength2(oCRMNumber, 1, 20);
                bValid = bValid && checkLength2(oUserName, 1, 20);
                bValid = bValid && checkLength2(oEmail, 5, 50);

                if (bValid) {
                    var postData;
                    postData = 'i=' + oCRMNumber.val();
                    postData += '&u=' + oUserName.val();
                    postData += '&e=' + oEmail.val();
                    // $("#imgPost").attr("src", "/images/loading.gif");
                    $.ajax({
                        type: 'POST',
                        url: '/ajax/ResetPassword.ashx',
                        data: postData,
                        dataType: 'json',
                        success: function (JSON) {
                            if (JSON == null) {
                                $("#divResetForm").hide();
                                $("#divResetInfo").fadeIn();
                                $("#spResetText").text('Cari kodu, kullanıcı adı veya e-mail bilgilerinden biri hatalıdır. Şifreniz gönderilemedi, lütfen yeniden deneyin.');
                            }
                            else {
                                $("#divResetForm").hide();
                                $("#divResetInfo").fadeIn();
                                $("#spResetText").text('Yeni şifreniz eposta adresinize gönderildi.');
                            }
                        }
                    });
                }


            });
        });
        // ]]>
    </script>
